org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui

Class TextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.TextFactory

  • public class TextFactory
extends Object
    Convenience class for getting text from the resource bundles. This class manages all different classes of resources with convenient methods for returning strings.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String format(Enum key, Object... args)
      Gets the formatted resource string associated with the provided key.
      static String getText(Enum key)
      Gets the resource string associated with the provided Key.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public static String getText(Enum key)
        Gets the resource string associated with the provided Key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the resource string to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The string that corresponds to the provided resource key, or an empty string if the resource key is not found.

      • format

        public static String format(Enum key,
                            Object... args)
        Gets the formatted resource string associated with the provided key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key of the resource string to retrieve.
        args - The arguments used to format the string.
        Returns:
        The string that corresponds to the provided resource key, or an empty string if the resource key is not found.
